public_indexes.index_definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX blog_posts_pkey ON public.blog_posts USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX blog_posts_slug_key ON public.blog_posts USING btree (slug)
CREATE INDEX idx_blog_posts_author_id ON public.blog_posts USING btree (author_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX client_error_events_correlation_id_key ON public.client_error_events USING btree (correlation_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX client_error_events_pkey ON public.client_error_events USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX client_error_events_release_reported_at_idx ON public.client_error_events USING btree (app_release, reported_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX client_error_events_reported_at_idx ON public.client_error_events USING btree (reported_at DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX consolidation_orders_pkey ON public.consolidation_orders USING btree (consolidation_id, order_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidation_orders_consolidation_id ON public.consolidation_orders USING btree (consolidation_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidation_orders_order_id ON public.consolidation_orders USING btree (order_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX consolidations_pkey ON public.consolidations USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidations_container_type_id ON public.consolidations USING btree (container_type_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidations_cost_variance ON public.consolidations USING btree (cost_variance)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidations_cost_variance_pct ON public.consolidations USING btree (cost_variance_percentage)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidations_creation_date_desc ON public.consolidations USING btree (creation_date DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidations_customer_creation_date_desc ON public.consolidations USING btree (customer_id, creation_date DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidations_customer_id ON public.consolidations USING btree (customer_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidations_estimated_cost ON public.consolidations USING btree (estimated_shipping_cost)
CREATE INDEX idx_consolidations_status ON public.consolidations USING btree (status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX container_types_pkey ON public.container_types USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX customers_email_key ON public.customers USING btree (email)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX customers_pkey ON public.customers USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX newsletter_subscribers_email_key ON public.newsletter_subscribers USING btree (email)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX newsletter_subscribers_pkey ON public.newsletter_subscribers USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_admin_importance ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id, importance) WHERE (user_id IS NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_cleanup ON public.notifications USING btree (is_read, "timestamp")

CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_content_dedup ON public.notifications USING btree (COALESCE((user_id)::text, 'null'::text), ((metadata ->> 'event_type'::text)), ((metadata ->> 'related_entity_type'::text)), ((metadata ->> 'related_entity_id'::text))) WHERE (((metadata ->> 'event_type'::text) IS NOT NULL) AND ((metadata ->> 'related_entity_type'::text) IS NOT NULL) AND ((metadata ->> 'related_entity_id'::text) IS NOT NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_event_type ON public.notifications USING btree (event_type)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_importance ON public.notifications USING btree (importance)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_is_read ON public.notifications USING btree (is_read)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_metadata ON public.notifications USING gin (metadata)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_related_entity ON public.notifications USING btree (related_entity_type, related_entity_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_target_audience ON public.notifications USING btree (target_audience)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_timestamp ON public.notifications USING btree ("timestamp" DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_user_id ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_user_id_timestamp ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id, "timestamp" DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_user_target_audience ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id, target_audience)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_user_unread ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id, is_read) WHERE (is_read = false)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX notifications_pkey ON public.notifications USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_orders_charges_applied ON public.orders USING btree (charges_applied)
CREATE INDEX idx_orders_creation_date_desc ON public.orders USING btree (creation_date DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_orders_customer_creation_date_desc ON public.orders USING btree (customer_id, creation_date DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_orders_customer_id ON public.orders USING btree (customer_id)

CREATE INDEX idx_orders_shipping_status ON public.orders USING btree (status) WHERE (status = ANY (ARRAY['InTransit'::order_status, 'AtOriginPort'::order_status, 'InTransitSea'::order_status, 'AtDestinationPort'::order_status, 'CustomsClearance'::order_status, 'AwaitingDelivery'::order_status, 'OutForDelivery'::order_status]))
CREATE INDEX idx_orders_status ON public.orders USING btree (status)

CREATE INDEX idx_orders_status_workflow ON public.orders USING btree (status) WHERE (status = ANY (ARRAY['Pending'::order_status, 'Processing'::order_status, 'QualityCheck'::order_status, 'ReadyToShip'::order_status]))
CREATE INDEX idx_orders_supplier_id ON public.orders USING btree (supplier_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX orders_pkey ON public.orders USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_consolidation_type_date ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (customer_id, related_consolidation_id, type, date)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_customer_date_desc ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (customer_id, date DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_customer_id ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (customer_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_date_desc ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (date DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_related_consolidation_id ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (related_consolidation_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_related_order_id ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (related_order_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_related_shipment_id ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (related_shipment_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX payment_transactions_pkey ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX prevent_exact_duplicate_transactions ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (customer_id, related_consolidation_id, type, amount, description, date)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uniq_payment_transactions_idempotency_key ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (idempotency_key) WHERE ((idempotency_key IS NOT NULL) AND (btrim(idempotency_key) <> ''::text))

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX unique_shipping_cost_per_individual_order ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (customer_id, related_order_id, type) WHERE ((type = 'ShippingCost'::transaction_type) AND (related_order_id IS NOT NULL) AND (related_consolidation_id IS NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_actual_delivery ON public.shipments USING btree (actual_delivery)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_consolidation_id ON public.shipments USING btree (consolidation_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_customer_id ON public.shipments USING btree (customer_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_estimated_delivery ON public.shipments USING btree (estimated_delivery)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_idempotency_key ON public.shipments USING btree (idempotency_key)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_is_mixed ON public.shipments USING btree (is_mixed)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_order_id ON public.shipments USING btree (order_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_related_id ON public.shipments USING btree (related_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_status ON public.shipments USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_type ON public.shipments USING btree (type)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX shipments_pkey ON public.shipments USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX suppliers_pkey ON public.suppliers USING btree (id)

public_functions.return_type: TABLE(area_label text, total_events bigint, last_24h bigint, last_seen timestamp with time zone)
TABLE(release_label text, total_events bigint, last_24h bigint, last_seen timestamp with time zone, daily_counts integer[])

TABLE(total_suppliers bigint, total_orders bigint, total_shipments bigint, total_active_consolidations bigint, pending_orders bigint, in_progress_orders bigint, ready_orders bigint, departing_soon bigint, capacity_risk bigint, missing_tracking bigint, missing_shipment bigint, negative_balances bigint)
TABLE(reported_at timestamp with time zone, correlation_id text, area text, app_release text, message text)

public_functions.args: p_customer_id uuid, p_related_consolidation_id uuid, p_type transaction_type, p_amount numeric, p_description text
p_user_id uuid, p_event_type text, p_related_entity_type text, p_related_entity_id text, p_hours_back integer
read_retention_days integer, unread_retention_days integer, batch_size integer

p_consolidation_id uuid, p_shipping_cost numeric, p_cost_variance numeric, p_cost_variance_percentage numeric, p_carrier text, p_tracking_url text, p_estimated_delivery timestamp with time zone, p_description text, p_status text, p_customer_id uuid, p_involved_customer_ids text[], p_is_mixed boolean, p_origin text, p_destination text, p_idempotency_key text
public_functions.return_type: TABLE(shipment_id uuid, consolidation_status text, created boolean)

public_triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER create_customer_on_signup_trigger AFTER INSERT ON auth.users FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION create_customer_on_signup()
CREATE TRIGGER trigger_calculate_cost_variance BEFORE INSERT OR UPDATE ON consolidations FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION calculate_cost_variance()
CREATE TRIGGER update_consolidations_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON consolidations FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
CREATE TRIGGER update_customers_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON customers FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
CREATE TRIGGER update_orders_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON orders FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
CREATE TRIGGER trg_enforce_shipment_write_guards BEFORE INSERT OR UPDATE OF type, related_id, idempotency_key ON shipments FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION enforce_shipment_write_guards()
CREATE TRIGGER update_shipments_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON shipments FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
CREATE TRIGGER update_suppliers_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON suppliers FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()

public_policies.with_check: (((length(correlation_id) >= 8) AND (length(correlation_id) <= 120)) AND ((length(area) >= 1) AND (length(area) <= 120)) AND ((length(message) >= 1) AND (length(message) <= 4000)) AND (COALESCE(length(app_release), 0) <= 120) AND (COALESCE(length(url), 0) <= 2048) AND (COALESCE(length(user_agent), 0) <= 1024))

public_policies.qual:
(is_admin() OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM consolidations c
  WHERE ((c.id = consolidation_orders.consolidation_id) AND ((c.customer_id = auth.uid()) OR ((auth.uid())::text = ANY (c.involved_customer_ids)))))))
